name: Time Imperium
description:
This is a prototype that was made during my final year as a final year group project. I edited some of the features in the game in order to upload the game here. The game may have some issues and bugs. Please feel free to comment, give suggestions, or like the game. I will continue this game or make a new project based on the responses. This is an inspiration from Timelie. 

W/A/S/D = Movements 

Left Mouse Button = Crouch 

Right Mouse Button = Sprint/Run 

Q = Use Time Manipulation power 

Walkthrough :
